markdownRemark.excerpt: As I was sitting in a hip taco spot in downtown Boise this past weekend, I started reflecting on what this city means to me. Growing up…
markdownRemark.html: <img src={‘boise.jpg’}> As I was sitting in a hip taco spot in downtown Boise this past weekend, I started reflecting on what this city means to me. Growing up, I never really had a hometown, bouncing from city to city, state to state and even country to country meant nowhere gave me that feeling of “home”. Until I moved to Boise for my undergrad.

frontmatter.title: Missing Places
frontmatter.description: Our minds ascribe a certain feeling to places we have in our memory, which influences how we view that places when reflecting on it.
